description: Number of compositions of n into prime parts.
references: S. R. Finch, Mathematical Constants, Cambridge, 2003, pp. 292-295.
Silvia Heubach and Toufik Mansour, Combinatorics of Compositions and Words, CRC Press, 2010.
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n=0..500
Philippe Flajolet, More information including asymptotic form (1995).
P. Flajolet and R. Sedgewick, Analytic Combinatorics, 2009; see page 43, 298
formula: a(n) = Sum_{prime p<=n} a(n-p) with a(0)=1. - _Henry Bottomley_, Dec 15 2000
crossrefs: Cf. A000607 for the unordered (partition) version.
author: _David W. Wilson_
